mapper.sql: id, jgbh, jgmc, nf, srhj, czbz, sysr, jysr, qtsr, update_time
mapper.select:
SELECT ANY_VALUE(nf) AS nf, ANY_VALUE(jgbh) AS jgbh, ANY_VALUE(jgmc) AS jgmc, ROUND(SUM(srhj)/10000,2) AS srhj, ROUND(SUM(czbz)/10000,2) AS czbz, ROUND(SUM(sysr)/10000,2) AS sysr, ROUND(SUM(jysr)/10000,2) AS jysr, ROUND(SUM(qtsr)/10000,2) AS qtsr FROM stat_arp_fin_income
1 = 1
AND nf >= #{startYear} AND nf <= #{endYear}
GROUP BY nf, jgbh, jgmc

SELECT ANY_VALUE(nf) AS nf, ANY_VALUE(jgbh) AS jgbh, ANY_VALUE(jgmc) AS jgmc, ROUND(SUM(zchj)/10000,2) AS zchj, ROUND(SUM(ryzc)/10000,2) AS ryzc, ROUND(SUM(gyzc)/10000,2) AS gyzc, ROUND(SUM(jyzc)/10000,2) AS jyzc FROM stat_arp_fin_expand
1 = 1
AND nf >= #{startYear} AND nf <= #{endYear}
GROUP BY nf, jgbh, jgmc
